body: St. Ann's School announced a successor yesterday to its headmaster, Stanley Bosworth. Mr. Bosworth, 76, the school's first headmaster and a charismatic force in making the private school, a Brooklyn Heights institution, into one of the city's most successful, will retire this year, and school officials said Dr. Lawrence S. Weiss would succeed him.
